channel.title: Question about server status :)
channel.description:
Hello everyone i was wondering how to make my own server status page like to show server name port ip and offline and online thing :) i think it would be really cool to know how to make one and have one of my own. So if anyone knows how please reply or pm me !! :) If i make one and realese i will give credits to who ever helps me out
Thanks!!! :D :) **++LegendMaker++**

item.title: Question about server status :)
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

mySQL would be needed, if you would like to create yours from scratch, I suggest getting databases set and fields so when you have lets say fields for: Name, IP, Details.

After clicking “ACCEPT” it will create a new table in which it would list those, also have a thing that pings it to the server in order to check if its online or not.

Read full topic
